trans-unit.source: The XmlSiteMapProvider class is derived from the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> class and is the default site map provider for ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: XmlSiteMapProvider 類別衍生自<xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref>類別，並為 ASP.NET 的預設站台對應提供者。

trans-unit.source: The XmlSiteMapProvider class generates site map trees from XML files with the file name extension .sitemap.
trans-unit.target: XmlSiteMapProvider 類別會從 XML 檔案與檔案名稱副檔名.sitemap 產生站台對應樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: The XmlSiteMapProvider class loads site map data from an XML file that follows a known schema.
trans-unit.target: XmlSiteMapProvider 類別從遵循已知的結構描述的 XML 檔案載入網站地圖資料。

trans-unit.source: The site map data is bounded by `<siteMap>` tags and consists of nested `<siteMapNode>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 站台地圖資料會受限於`<siteMap>`標記，並將包含巢狀`<siteMapNode>`標記。

trans-unit.source: Two constraints are imposed by the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> and XmlSiteMapProvider classes on the structure of the site map data: - Only one root node can exist.
trans-unit.target: 兩個條件約束所加諸<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>和 XmlSiteMapProvider 類別之結構的站台對應的資料:-只能存在一個根節點。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>

trans-unit.source: - For <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects that specify URLs, the URLs must be unique within the scope of the provider.
trans-unit.target: -若為<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>指定 Url、 Url 必須是唯一的提供者的範圍內的物件。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: (For nodes that do not specify URLs, all keys must be unique.) The following code example shows an example of an XML file that can be used with the XmlSiteMapProvider.
trans-unit.target: （不指定 Url 的節點，所有索引鍵必須是唯一的。） 下列程式碼範例示範可以搭配 XmlSiteMapProvider 的 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: ``` <siteMap> <siteMapNode title="RootNode" description="This is the root node of the site map. There can be only one root node." url="Page1.aspx" > <siteMapNode title="ChildofRootNode" description="Descriptions do not have to be unique." url="Page2.aspx"> <siteMapNode title="ChildOfChildNode" description="SiteMapNode objects can be nested to any level." url="Page3.aspx"/> </siteMapNode> <siteMapNode title="ChildofRootNode" description="Descriptions do not have to be unique." url="Page4.aspx"/> </siteMapNode> </siteMap> ``` The XmlSiteMapProvider is the default provider for ASP.NET and it reads XML data from a file named Web.sitemap that is located within the directory structure of the ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: ``` <siteMap> <siteMapNode title="RootNode" description="This is the root node of the site map. There can be only one root node." url="Page1.aspx" > <siteMapNode title="ChildofRootNode" description="Descriptions do not have to be unique." url="Page2.aspx"> <siteMapNode title="ChildOfChildNode" description="SiteMapNode objects can be nested to any level." url="Page3.aspx"/> </siteMapNode> <siteMapNode title="ChildofRootNode" description="Descriptions do not have to be unique." url="Page4.aspx"/> </siteMapNode> </siteMap> ```XmlSiteMapProvider 是 ASP.NET 的預設提供者和 XML 資料讀取為 Web.sitemap 位於 ASP.NET 應用程式的目錄結構內的檔案。

trans-unit.source: By default, the Web.sitemap file is located at the application root; however, if you want to change the name or location of the file from which the XmlSiteMapProvider loads data, you can override the default configuration in your Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，Web.sitemap 檔案位於應用程式根目錄。不過，如果您想要變更名稱或從中 XmlSiteMapProvider 載入資料檔的位置，您可以覆寫預設設定 Web.config 檔案中。

trans-unit.source: By overriding the default configuration settings in your Web.config file, you can tailor the behavior of the XmlSiteMapProvider for each ASP.NET application, as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 透過覆寫 Web.config 檔案中的預設組態設定，您可以調整每個 ASP.NET 應用程式，視 XmlSiteMapProvider 的行為。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates an example Web.config file, where the XmlSiteMapProvider is still used, but a different site map file is used.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範範例 Web.config 檔案，其中 XmlSiteMapProvider 仍在使用中，但會使用不同的站台對應檔案。

trans-unit.source: Because all providers in a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProviderCollection> object must be named uniquely, the one that is specified in the Web.config file uses a name other than the default but is also set as the default provider so that it will be used instead of the XmlSiteMapProvider that is specified in the default ASP.NET configuration.
trans-unit.target: 因為所有的提供者中<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProviderCollection>物件必須具有唯一名稱、 Web.config 檔案中指定了一個使用預設值以外的名稱，但也會設為預設提供者，讓它將會用來取代預設 ASP.NET 組態中所指定 XmlSiteMapProvider。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapProviderCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can change the name of the site navigation data file, but you cannot change its extension.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您可以變更站台瀏覽資料檔案名稱，但您無法變更其副檔名。

trans-unit.source: The XmlSiteMapProvider only reads data from files that are named with the file name extension .sitemap.
trans-unit.target: XmlSiteMapProvider 只會從所命名的檔案名稱副檔名.sitemap 檔案讀取資料。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new, unnamed, instance of the <xref href="System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的未命名的執行個體<xref href="System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref> object to the collections that are maintained by the current provider.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref>物件至目前的提供者所維護的集合。

trans-unit.source: The `node` parameter is added to an internal collection, and a parent/child relationship is created between it and `parentNode`.
trans-unit.target: `node`參數會加入至內部集合，而且它之間建立父子式關聯性和`parentNode`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> class, derived from the <xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider> class and the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object as a lookup key in its internal collections, by default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>類別、 衍生自<xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider>類別和 ASP.NET 中，使用的預設站台對應提供者<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>物件做為查閱索引鍵中，依預設其內部集合。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A> </xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider> </xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> is set, it must be unique within the scope of the provider.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>已經設定，它必須是唯一的提供者的範圍內。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A> method attempts to retrieve nodes based on their <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A>方法會嘗試擷取節點根據其<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A>.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A> </xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you can use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Key%2A> property, and the corresponding <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNodeFromKey%2A> method, to retrieve nodes.
trans-unit.target: 否則，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Key%2A>屬性，並對應<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNodeFromKey%2A>方法，以擷取節點。</xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNodeFromKey%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Key%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref> to add to the provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"> </xref>加入提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref> under which to add `node`.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"> </xref>在其下加入`node`。

trans-unit.source: node or parentNode is .
trans-unit.target: nodeor parentNode is .

trans-unit.source: The current is not the provider associated with node.
trans-unit.target: 目前不提供者相關聯 node 。

trans-unit.source: Links a child site map provider to the current provider.
trans-unit.target: 連結至目前的提供者的子站台地圖提供者。

trans-unit.source: The AddProvider method links `providerName` to the current provider as a child of the current provider.
trans-unit.target: AddProvider 方法連結`providerName`到目前的提供者目前的提供者的子系。

trans-unit.source: The root node of `providerName` is added to the hierarchy for the current provider as a child node of `parentNode`.
trans-unit.target: 根節點`providerName`的子節點加入至目前的提供者的階層`parentNode`。

trans-unit.source: Because the parent provider calls the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A> method on `providerName`, the exceptions that are described in the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A> method might be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 因為父提供者會呼叫<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A>方法`providerName`，如下所述的例外狀況<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A>方法可能會擲回。</xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A> </xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of one of the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> objects currently registered in the <xref:System.Web.SiteMap.Providers*>.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個的名稱<xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"> </xref> <xref:System.Web.SiteMap.Providers*>。</xref:System.Web.SiteMap.Providers*>目前已註冊的物件

trans-unit.source: A site map node of the current site map provider under which the root node and all nodes of the child provider is added.
trans-unit.target: 站台對應的節點加入根節點和子系提供者的所有節點目前站台地圖提供者。

trans-unit.source: The property of the parentNode does not reference the current provider.
trans-unit.target: 屬性 parentNode 未參考目前的提供者。

trans-unit.source: parentNode is .
trans-unit.target: parentNodeis .

trans-unit.source: providerName cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: providerName無法解析。

trans-unit.source: The site map file used by providerName is already in use within the provider hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的站台對應檔案 providerName 已在提供者階層內使用。

trans-unit.source: -or- The root node returned by providerName is .
trans-unit.target: -所傳回的根節點 providerName 是 。

trans-unit.source: -or- The root node returned by providerName has a URL or key that is already registered with the parent .
trans-unit.target: -所傳回的根節點 providerName URL 或已登錄有父系的索引鍵 。

trans-unit.source: Loads the site map information from an XML file and builds it in memory.
trans-unit.target: 載入站台對應資訊從 XML 檔案，並建置記憶體中。

trans-unit.source: The BuildSiteMap method is called to load and build the site map from persistent storage.
trans-unit.target: BuildSiteMap 呼叫這個方法是為了載入和建置從永續性儲存體的站台對應。

trans-unit.source: For the default behavior when security trimming is enabled, see "Remarks" in <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.IsAccessibleToUser%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 預設行為時調整安全性已啟用，請參閱 < 備註 > 一<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.IsAccessibleToUser%2A>。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.IsAccessibleToUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> object parses and loads site map data, all loaded <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collections are made read-only.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>物件剖析並載入站台對應資料，所有已載入<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>物件和<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>集合會變成唯讀。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> parses the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A> property from a site map file, it converts application-relative URLs, as well as relative URLs, to application-absolute virtual paths.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>剖析<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A>屬性從站台對應檔中，它將應用程式相對 Url，以及相對的 Url，應用程式絕對虛擬路徑。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A> </xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> subscribes to file change notifications for the .sitemap file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>.Sitemap 檔案的檔案變更通知訂閱。</xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>

trans-unit.source: If any change is made to the .sitemap file, the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> is reloaded, and the site map structure is rebuilt.
trans-unit.target: 如果.sitemap 檔案中，會進行任何變更<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>會重新載入，然後重建網站導覽結構。</xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>

trans-unit.source: Returns the root <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref> of the site map navigation structure.
trans-unit.target: 傳回根<xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref>的站台對應導覽結構。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_siteMapFile" name="siteMapFile" href=""></xref> is specified but the path lies outside the current directory structure for the application.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_siteMapFile" name="siteMapFile" href=""> </xref>指定但路徑之外的應用程式目前的目錄結構。

trans-unit.source: A named provider cannot be found in the current site map providers collection.
trans-unit.target: 在目前的站台對應提供者集合中找不到具名的提供者。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_<siteMapNode>" name="<siteMapNode>" href=""></xref> referencing a site map file contains an empty string for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_siteMapFile" name="siteMapFile" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_<siteMapNode>" name="<siteMapNode>" href=""> </xref>參照站台對應檔包含為空字串。 <xref uid="langword_csharp_siteMapFile" name="siteMapFile" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes all elements in the collections of child and parent site map nodes and site map providers that the <xref href="System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider"></xref> object internally tracks as part of its state.
trans-unit.target: 子項和父站台對應節點和站台對應提供者的集合中移除所有項目， <xref href="System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider"> </xref>物件在內部會追蹤其狀態的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> class overrides the inherited Clear method to provide additional state cleanup beyond the basic <xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> implementation, including clearing its child provider tracking and the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.RootNode%2A> property tracking mechanisms.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>類別會覆寫繼承的清除方法，以提供基本以外的其他狀態清除<xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>實作，包括清除追蹤其子提供者和<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.RootNode%2A>屬性追蹤機制。</xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.RootNode%2A> </xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref> object that represents the currently requested page.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref>物件，代表目前要求的頁面。

trans-unit.source: The site map object that represents the currently requested page.
trans-unit.target: 站台對應物件，代表目前要求的頁面。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the file monitor of the Web.sitemap file that the <xref href="System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider"></xref> object no longer requires the file to be monitored.
trans-unit.target: 通知的檔案監視 Web.sitemap 檔<xref href="System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider"></xref>物件不再需要監視的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> class implements the <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method of the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface to release its associated file monitor when the site map file is unloaded from memory.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>類別會實作<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法<xref:System.IDisposable>介面，以釋放其相關聯的檔案監視的站台對應檔案會從記憶體卸載。</xref:System.IDisposable> </xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>

trans-unit.source: This overload of the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.Dispose%2A> method calls the overload that takes a <xref:System.Boolean> parameter and sets the value to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.Dispose%2A>方法呼叫的多載，<xref:System.Boolean>參數並將值設定為`true`。</xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the file monitor of the Web.sitemap file that the <xref href="System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider"></xref> object no longer requires the file to be monitored.
trans-unit.target: 通知的檔案監視 Web.sitemap 檔<xref href="System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider"></xref>物件不再需要監視的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method takes a Boolean parameter indicating whether the method is called by user code.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法會採用布林參數，指出是否由使用者程式碼呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method returns `true` if the Dispose method is called by user code.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法會傳回`true`如果使用者程式碼呼叫的 Dispose 方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise it returns `false`, if the Dispose method is called by the finalizer thread during run time.
trans-unit.target: 否則它會傳回`false`，如果完成項執行緒在執行階段期間呼叫的 Dispose 方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref> object that represents the page at the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 擷取<xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref>物件，代表位於指定之 URL 的頁面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> object overrides the <xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A> method to ensure that any linked child providers are searched for the node if the implementation of the base class does not return a node for the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>物件會覆寫<xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A>方法，以確保如果基底類別的實作不會傳回指定之 url 的節點，連結的子系的任何提供者會搜尋節點。</xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A> </xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>

trans-unit.source: The `rawUrl` parameter should be either an absolute virtual path or an application-relative path, depending on how it is specified in the XML site map data file.
trans-unit.target: `rawUrl`參數應該是絕對虛擬路徑或應用程式的相對路徑，根據其 XML 站台對應資料檔案中的指定方式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> class and classes that are derived from it use the URL of a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object as a key in the various collections that the class maintains.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>類別和衍生自它的類別使用的 URL<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>做為索引鍵中的類別會維護的各種集合物件。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, these URLs must be unique within the scope of the site map.
trans-unit.target: 因此，這些 Url 必須是唯一的站台對應範圍內。

trans-unit.source: If the URL is not found within the immediate site map data that is managed by the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>, it calls the FindSiteMapNode on each child provider that is linked to it through the `provider` attribute of its site map nodes.
trans-unit.target: 如果立即網站導覽資料管理的內找不到 URL <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>，它會連結至其每一個子系提供者上呼叫 FindSiteMapNode`provider`其站台對應節點的屬性。</xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>

trans-unit.source: The FindSiteMapNode method indirectly calls the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A> method to retrieve the top-level node in the site map.
trans-unit.target: FindSiteMapNode 方法間接呼叫<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A>方法來擷取站台對應中的最上層節點。</xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, any exceptions that occur for the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A> method can also occur when calling the FindSiteMapNode method.
trans-unit.target: 因此，會發生任何例外狀況<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A>方法呼叫 FindSiteMapNode 方法時也會發生。</xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A>

trans-unit.source: A URL that identifies the page for which to retrieve a <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 識別要擷取的頁面 URL <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A that represents the page identified by rawURL.
trans-unit.target: A ，代表所識別的頁面 rawURL 。

trans-unit.source: A child provider linked to the current site map provider returned a node that is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 子提供者會連結至目前傳回的節點不是有效的站台對應提供者。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref> object based on a specified key.
trans-unit.target: 擷取<xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref>指定索引鍵為基礎的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> class overrides the <xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNodeFromKey%2A> method to ensure that any linked child providers are searched for the node, if the implementation for the base class does not return a node for `key`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>類別覆寫<xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNodeFromKey%2A>方法，以確保如果基底類別的實作不會傳回的節點連結的子系的任何提供者會搜尋節點，而`key`。</xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNodeFromKey%2A> </xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> object, derived from the <xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider> class and the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object as a lookup key in its internal collections, by default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>物件，衍生自<xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider>類別和 ASP.NET 中，使用的預設站台對應提供者<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>物件做為查閱索引鍵中，依預設其內部集合。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A> </xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider> </xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> is set, it must be unique within the scope of the provider.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>已經設定，它必須是唯一的提供者的範圍內。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A> is specified, the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> automatically generates a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Key%2A> to track the nodes.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A>指定，則<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>會自動產生<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Key%2A>追蹤節點。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Key%2A> </xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A>

trans-unit.source: The FindSiteMapNodeFromKey method might call the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A> method on any child providers that are associated with the current provider.
trans-unit.target: FindSiteMapNodeFromKey 方法可能會呼叫<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A>上目前的提供者相關聯的任何子系提供者方法。</xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the exceptions that are described in the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A> method might be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如下所述的例外狀況<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A>方法可能會擲回。</xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A>

trans-unit.source: A lookup key with which to search for a <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋與查閱索引鍵<xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A that represents the page identified by key; otherwise, , if security trimming is enabled and the node cannot be shown to the current user or the node is not found by key in the node collection.
trans-unit.target: A ，代表所識別的頁面 key ，否則 ，如果已啟用安全性調整和節點無法顯示目前的使用者或由找不到節點 key 節點集合中。

trans-unit.source: A child provider linked to the current site map provider returned a node that is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 子提供者會連結至目前傳回的節點不是有效的站台對應提供者。

trans-unit.source: Returns the child nodes of the site map.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的子站台對應的節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref> object to get child nodes from.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"> </xref>来取得從子節點物件。

trans-unit.source: A collection of site map nodes.
trans-unit.target: 站台對應節點的集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the parent node of the site map.
trans-unit.target: 傳回站台對應的父節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref> object to get the parent node from.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"> </xref>取得從父節點的物件。

trans-unit.source: The parent node of the site map.
trans-unit.target: 站台對應的父節點。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the top-level node of the current site map data structure.
trans-unit.target: 擷取目前的站台對應資料結構的最上層節點。

trans-unit.source: The GetRootNodeCore method calls the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A> method to retrieve the top-level node in the site map.
trans-unit.target: GetRootNodeCore 方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A>方法來擷取站台對應中的最上層節點。</xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, any exceptions that occur for the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A> method can also occur when calling the GetRootNodeCore method.
trans-unit.target: 因此，會發生任何例外狀況<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A>方法呼叫 GetRootNodeCore 方法時也會發生。</xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref> that represents the top-level node in the current site map data structure.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"> </xref> ，代表目前的站台對應的資料結構中的最上層節點。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref href="System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method does not actually build a site map, it only prepares the state of the <xref href="System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider"></xref> to do so.
trans-unit.target: Initialize 方法不會實際建立站台對應，它只會準備的狀態<xref href="System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider"></xref>若要這樣做。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> class overrides the inherited Initialize method to apply several attributes, such as the `siteMapFile` and `description` attributes, to the `attributes` collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>類別會覆寫繼承的 Initialize 方法，以套用數個屬性，例如`siteMapFile`和`description`屬性，為`attributes`集合。</xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider"></xref> to initialize.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider"> </xref>初始化。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> that can contain additional attributes to help initialize `name`.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref> ，可以包含其他屬性，以協助初始化`name`。

trans-unit.source: These attributes are read from the <xref href="System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider"></xref> configuration in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性從讀取<xref href="System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider"> </xref> Web.config 檔案中的組態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider"></xref> is initialized more than once.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider"> </xref>初始化一次以上。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref> object from all node collections that are tracked by the provider.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定<xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref>會追蹤提供者的所有節點集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: The node to remove from the node collections.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除的節點集合節點。

trans-unit.source: node is .
trans-unit.target: nodeis .

trans-unit.source: Removes a linked child site map provider from the hierarchy for the current provider.
trans-unit.target: 移除目前的提供者的階層連結的子站台地圖提供者。

trans-unit.source: The RemoveProvider method removes `providerName` from the hierarchy for the current provider, including any parent/child relationships that are established by the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.AddProvider%2A> method between site map nodes of the current provider and the removed provider.
trans-unit.target: RemoveProvider 方法會移除`providerName`從目前的提供者階層，包括所建立的任何父/子關聯性<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.AddProvider%2A>目前的提供者的站台對應節點和移除提供者之間的方法。</xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.AddProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of one of the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> objects currently registered in the <xref:System.Web.SiteMap.Providers*>.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個的名稱<xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"> </xref> <xref:System.Web.SiteMap.Providers*>。</xref:System.Web.SiteMap.Providers*>目前已註冊的物件

trans-unit.source: providerName cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: providerName無法解析。

trans-unit.source: providerName is not a registered child provider of the current site map provider.
trans-unit.target: providerName不是目前的站台地圖提供者的已註冊的子系提供者。

trans-unit.source: providerName is .
trans-unit.target: providerNameis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the root node of the site map.
trans-unit.target: 取得網站的根節點。

trans-unit.source: The RootNode property calls the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A> method to retrieve the top-level node in the site map.
trans-unit.target: 根節點屬性呼叫<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A>方法來擷取站台對應中的最上層節點。</xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, any exceptions that occur for the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A> method can also occur when accessing the RootNode property.
trans-unit.target: 因此，會發生任何例外狀況<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A>方法存取的根節點屬性時也會發生。</xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.BuildSiteMap%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> and <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> classes permit only one root <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object in a site map.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>和<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>類別允許只能有一個根<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>網站導覽中的物件。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> class overrides the abstract <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.RootNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property and provides a simple implementation to track the root node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>類別會覆寫的抽象<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.RootNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，並提供追蹤的根節點的簡單實作。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.RootNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref> that represents the root node of the site map; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if security trimming is enabled and the root node is not accessible to the current user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"> </xref>代表站台地圖的根節點，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，如果安全性調整已啟用，而且根節點不是目前的使用者可以存取。
